import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./Aside.css"; function Aside() { const [theme, setTheme] = useState('light'); useEffect(() => { document.body.className = theme; // Adiciona a classe ao body }, [theme]); const handleThemeChange = (event) => { setTheme(event.target.value); }; return (

); } export default Aside;
